name: Cats in Space (itch)
description:
Defend your ship against the oncoming invasion! Rats have found their way onto your ship, and you meowst fight back! The fearsome Captain will have to protect the crew as they repair damage to the ship, but the rat army is seemingly endless...

An endless turn-based strategy game with cats!

Genre: Turn-Based

Theme: Space

Setting: Spaceship

Item: Cat

This was our first go at a game jam, and we had a lot of fun with it! We had a lot of plans to expand on the ideas but sadly we had to wrap things up quite quickly! 

Made by Linda Vet  (Art) & Glenn McCombie (Programming)

Sound effects & music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
